name: BUILDINXZ
description:
DISCLAIMER :

ADULT ONLY MOTIF 

PLEASE NOT FOR CHILDREN OR ANYONE UNDER THE AGE 21 , DO NOT PRESENT TO ANYONE WITH HEART CONDITIONS OR MENTAL CONDITION  & NOT CAPABLE OF UNDERSTANDING THE  DEPLICTIONS OF CRIME PRESENTED  WITHIN THIS SCARY & DISTURBING 3D GAME .

SCARY 3D GAME FORESICK SCENE COLLECTOR INVESTIGATOR SIMULATOR 

INVESTIGATE; ATTAIN 8 PAGES OF EVIDENCE WITHIN THE SCENE . like severed limb, knife, ciggeretes, dynimite, and axe and misc.

WARNING : ADULT ONLY ! NUDITY AND GORE ! ! ! NOT FOR CHILDREN . 

ARRIVE TO  BUILDING XZ , A MYSTERIOUS ABANDON FACILITY WHERE MANY YOUTH ARE KNOWN TO TRESPASS,  WTF COULD HAVE HAPPENED ?

FIND MUTLPLE CORPSES IN DIFFRENT SENERIO, IN A TWIST YOU FIND TOOLS AND GET CLOSER TO FINDING ANSWERS 

GAMEPLAY 10-30 MINUTES
